definition: to grasp/to hold/to operate/to manage/to control/to steer/to exercise/to drill (practice)/to play/to speak (a language)
warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
to manipulate from behind the scenes/to pull the strings
to operate (a machine etc) with ease

sentences.english: I just emphasized different elements in a way to manipulate your intuitions.
sentences.chinese: 我只是強調了不同的要素來操縱你們的直覺。

sentences.english: Feed is manually provided by cranking the handle of the compound rest.
sentences.chinese: 通過搖動複式刀架操縱柄手動提供進給。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a type of steering unit for the ship fitted with two rudder-propellers.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了雙舵槳船上用的操縱裝置。

sentences.english: When the second operon with OC mutation, it will continue to express.
sentences.chinese: 當第二個操縱子帶有OC突變時，它將持續表達。

sentences.english: Increasingly, however, it is the Chinese who play Africans off against each other.
sentences.chinese: 然而，是中國人越來越多地操縱非洲人之間相互作對。

sentences.english: In peripheral equipment sticked hang "homework manipulate guidance".
sentences.chinese: 在周邊設備上貼掛“功課操縱指引”。

sentences.english: The second part is analysis of financial statements and manipulation ofDiamand.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分是達爾曼的操縱手段分析。

sentences.english: These levers were used to open the barrier inside the pond.
sentences.chinese: 這些操縱桿用來開放池子內部的遮擋板。

sentences.english: Knew that the carnival games had been gaffed .
sentences.chinese: 知道這些慶祝的表演競賽已被不法之徒所操縱。

sentences.english: Use the less dominant hand to move your computer mouse or write a letter.
sentences.chinese: 用較少用的手來操縱鼠標或寫信。

sentences.english: The door is photocell controlled by operating a keyboard.
sentences.chinese: 那扇門是通過操縱一個鍵盤，用光電管來控制的。

sentences.english: The protoss' ability to manipulate time and space far surpasses the limited understanding of other races.
sentences.chinese: 神族操縱時間和空間的能力已經遠遠超越了其他種族。

sentences.english: It was an old-fashioned lift, operated by a lever on a brass box.
sentences.chinese: 這是一部老式的電梯，由一個黃銅框架上的槓桿操縱。

sentences.english: How many Elemental Dragons guide and rule Ashan?
sentences.chinese: 一共有多少條元素龍統治和操縱着亞山年夜陸？

sentences.english: The wealthy landowner was accused of manipulating the local council.
sentences.chinese: 那個富裕的土地主被指控操縱地方議會。

sentences.english: The manipulation of gas supplies has become a weapon in this contest.
sentences.chinese: 在這場爭奪中，操縱燃氣供應成爲了一件有利武器。

definition: to speak in defense of/to argue in favor of/to defend/to plead
to utilize/to put sth to use
